articles.title: Binance.US Halts Direct Dollar Withdrawals - CoinDesk
articles.description: U.S. dollar deposits in user wallets are no longer eligible for FDIC insurance protection, according to the updated terms of use.
articles.content:
Binance.US users can no longer withdraw dollars directly from the platform after the exchange updated its terms of use on Monday.
